translations: n.头盔，盔甲（helmet 复数形式）

phrs.translation: 安全帽；（飞行员，摩托车驾驶员等的）防撞头盔

sentences.sentence: Helmets can give cyclists a false sense of security.
sentences.translation: 头盔能给骑自行车的人一种虚假的安全感。

sentences.sentence: It is compulsory for all motorcyclists to wear helmets.
sentences.translation: 所有骑摩托车的人都必须戴头盔，这是强制性的。

sentences.sentence: Helmets will be available for hire at all Vail Resort ski areas.
sentences.translation: 在韦尔度假村的所有滑雪场里都有头盔供出租。
